medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrent fever with no apparent cause for more than 10 months.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was first referred to the department in 2020 with recurrent fever episodes lasting about 1-5 days, with intervals of approximately 15 days between episodes. During fever episodes, the temperature was about 37.5°C with occasional increases up to 39°C, accompanied by bilateral conjunctival congestion and urticarial-like rash.
